extended_metaphor.metaphor: both Intermolecular Forces in molecular compounds and Repulsor Technology in Iron Man have a focus on Stability and Organization, maximizing stability and organization within a system to ensure efficient packing and arrangement of components without altering their individual characteristics directly
extended_metaphor.intermolecular_forces: Intermolecular Forces utilize various interactions such as dipole-dipole interactions, van der Waals forces, and hydrogen bonding to facilitate intermolecular interactions and positioning based on energetically favorable configurations.
extended_metaphor.repulsor_technology: Similarly, Repulsor Technology in Iron Man is designed to maintain stability and organization within the repulsor system, leveraging repulsor technology to efficiently channel and direct energy for propulsion and defensive capabilities without fundamentally altering the core attributes of the technology.
